transformations.name: SplitMTDYTD
transformations.description: Split the stream into MTD and YTD groups to assign the Target to the correct field

transformations.name: OtherFields
transformations.description: Creating the columns fkTimeLine, LastUpdated, fkDate

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		pkiTargetStaging as long,
		Concatenate as string,
		{BU Region} as string,
		{BU Region 2} as string,
		BURegion as string,
		Country as string,
		Plant as string,
		{Plt Code} as string,
		{Fin Year} as string,
		Month as string,
		{MTD/YTD} as string,
		Version as string,
		{KPI Name} as string,
		Target as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ODSTargets
source(output(
		pkiTargetMapping as long,
		TargetSourceName as string,
		MeasureName as string,
		fkMeasure as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> REFTargetMapping
source(output(
		SiteName as string,
		SiteLookup as string,
		fkSite as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> REFSite
source(output(
		Name as string,
		MonthN as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> REFMonth
source(output(
		FYear as string,
		NYear as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> REFYear
Select1 derive(TargetF = toFloat(Target),
		MeasureLookup = trim({KPI Name})) ~> TargetValue
TargetValue, REFTargetMapping lookup(MeasureLookup == TargetSourceName,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupMeasure
LookupMeasure split({MTD/YTD} == 'MTD',
	{MTD/YTD} == 'YTD',
	disjoint: true) ~> SplitMTDYTD@(MTD, YTD)
SplitMTDYTD@MTD derive(ValueMTD = TargetF,
		SiteLookup = lower(Plant)) ~> MTDCalc
SplitMTDYTD@YTD derive(ValueYTD = TargetF) ~> YTDCalc
MTDCalc, YTDCalc join(SplitMTDYTD@MTD@Plant == SplitMTDYTD@YTD@Plant
	&& SplitMTDYTD@MTD@{Fin Year} == SplitMTDYTD@YTD@{Fin Year}
	&& SplitMTDYTD@MTD@Month == SplitMTDYTD@YTD@Month
	&& SplitMTDYTD@MTD@{KPI Name} == SplitMTDYTD@YTD@{KPI Name}
	&& SplitMTDYTD@MTD@fkMeasure == SplitMTDYTD@YTD@fkMeasure,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'left')~> Combine
ODSTargets select(mapColumn(
		Plant,
		{Fin Year},
		Month,
		{MTD/YTD},
		{KPI Name},
		Target
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Select1
LookupSite, REFMonth lookup(Month == Name,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupMonth
LookupMonth, REFYear lookup({Fin Year} == FYear,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupYear
Select3 derive(fkTimeline = 3,
		LastUpdated = currentTimestamp(),
		fkDate = toDate(addDays(addMonths(toTimestamp(toString(NYear) + '.01.01', 'yyyy.MM.dd'), MonthN), -1))) ~> OtherFields
Select2, REFSite lookup(Select2@SiteLookup == REFSite@SiteLookup,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupSite
Combine select(mapColumn(
		Plant = SplitMTDYTD@MTD@Plant,
		{Fin Year} = SplitMTDYTD@MTD@{Fin Year},
		Month = SplitMTDYTD@MTD@Month,
		{KPI Name} = SplitMTDYTD@MTD@{KPI Name},
		fkMeasure = SplitMTDYTD@MTD@fkMeasure,
		ValueMTD,
		ValueYTD,
		SiteLookup
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Select2
LookupYear select(mapColumn(
		fkMeasure,
		ValueMTD,
		ValueYTD,
		fkSite,
		MonthN,
		NYear
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Select3
OtherFields sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		pkiTargets as long,
		fkMeasure as long,
		fkSite as long,
		fkDate as date,
		fkTimeLine as integer,
		ValueMTD as double,
		ValueYTD as double,
		LastUpdated as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	dateFormat:'yyyy-MM-dd',
	timestampFormat:'yyyy.MM.dd HH:mm:ss',
	errorHandlingOption: 'allErrors',
	transactionCommit: 'single',
	reportSuccessOnError: false,
	mapColumn(
		ValueMTD,
		ValueYTD,
		fkMeasure,
		fkTimeLine = fkTimeline,
		fkDate,
		LastUpdated,
		fkSite
	)) ~> DWTargets
